creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: large, "folded-over" organic form, asymmetrical design; dark brown, wood grain texture
text: Tanaka used the same method to sculpt this work as he did for the red, shiny The Tactile Memory: Floral Impression. However, the appearance of this work is very different. He ground the surface of the black outer layer unevenly in order to expose glimpses of the brown base layers and is therefore missing the shiny, polished finish.
title: Form Remaining in Memory 2012
